com.dhemery.expressions.polling

Class ClockPollTimer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dhemery.expressions.polling.ClockPollTimer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PollTimer

    public class ClockPollTimer
extends Object
implements PollTimer
    A poll timer that tells the time using a Clock and ticks by calling a Sleeper.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClockPollTimer()
      Creates a poll timer that tells time using a system clock and ticks by putting the current thread to sleep until the next wakeup time.
      ClockPollTimer(Clock clock)
      Creates a poll timer that tells time using the given clock and ticks by putting the thread to sleep until the next wakeup time.
      ClockPollTimer(Clock clock, Sleeper sleeper)
      Creates a poll timer that tells time using the given clock and ticks using the given sleeper.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isExpired()
      Returns whether the polling duration has passed since the timer was started.
      void start(PollingSchedule schedule)
      Marks the beginning of a poll using the given schedule.
      void tick()
      Pauses execution until the next evaluation time arrives.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClockPollTimer

        public ClockPollTimer()
        Creates a poll timer that tells time using a system clock and ticks by putting the current thread to sleep until the next wakeup time.

      • ClockPollTimer

        public ClockPollTimer(Clock clock)
        Creates a poll timer that tells time using the given clock and ticks by putting the thread to sleep until the next wakeup time.
        Parameters:
        clock - tells the time

      • ClockPollTimer

        public ClockPollTimer(Clock clock,
                      Sleeper sleeper)
        Creates a poll timer that tells time using the given clock and ticks using the given sleeper.
        Parameters:
        clock - tells the time
        sleeper - sleeps between polls
        Implementation Note
        This constructor exists primarily to allow tests to control the clock and to provide a mechanism for pretending to sleep.
